bug.short_desc: qooxdoo application crashes only on iPhone 4 and iPad

long_desc.thetext:
Hi,
My qooxdoo web app here: http://www.erh.noaa.gov/rlx/edd/
works without errors in most places, but for some reason on an iPhone and iPad using the safari browser it crashes. I can't seem to get any error messages of what is making it crash. I did read that safari has at timeout option that may be the culprit.
Interestingly enough, it work on the iPhone 4S and the latest iPad. I only found this bug since users of the site were emailing me that it crashes using their system. Do you guys have any ideas or is there a way to ping the safari browser to tell it that it is not timing out? It's been a difficult bug to track down.
Thanks for any help you may have!

Hey, just gave it a try on my iPhone 4 and it stars as expected. I do have the iOS6 beta installed which might be the difference. Otherwise, we can't help you much here. :| If safari crashing, you might check the logs of the phone using XCode to get some details about the reason. Sorry, Martin
